description: Updates the specified Data Lake Analytics account to add an Azure Storage account.

subscription_id.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

account_name.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.

storage_account_name.description: The name of the Azure Storage account to add

parameters.description: The parameters containing the access key and optional suffix for the Azure Storage Account.

properties.description: The Azure Storage account properties to use when adding a new Azure Storage account.
